title: [Stream] - RiotGradius, Currently Silver 3, Support Main
body:
Hello all!

I figured since I am trying to be more active on the new community beta, I could also share my stream here.  I usually stream in the mornings from 8AM PST - 10AM PST.

Like the title says, I main support, but I'm also working on learning different roles so that I have a better overall understanding of LoL.  At times I also play ARAMs with the viewers, in-houses are a ton of fun!  

So if you have free time in the morning, and you wanna watch me fail and yell at me for it, join me!

www.twitch.tv/riotgradius

PS: I wasn't sure if this was the right section for this sort of thing.... anyone have any suggestions?

Currently playing: No One :(

EDIT: Thanks all for joining me, was fun! I try + do this every day, and I'm thinking about making one day a week just a ton of community ARAMS.

replies.body: If you want to connect to the new community beta then I suggest hosting games where you invite them over to play with you. That would be a pretty cool "reward" to the ones that are investing their time into the community beta.
Yup I plan on having a day where all I do is community games :) It's always been a blast.
Well when I get the chance I'll be sure to check it out, expect me there!
He lies, he claims to "Play league of legends" yet all he does is code python.
That's not true! I do both :)
I'm here too come hang out :D

As was mentioned before I believe the better section may be e-sports, with Gameplay & strategy being a personal close 2nd. BUT WHILE YOUR HERE, may I ask what software your use to stream? I'm currently using OBS but I am always trying out new ones to find a good fit.

Thanks for posting and I'll try to watch when I can! Good luck!
Currently trying to play Jungle Shyvana :D
That's cool, I'm in EST so I can totally watch this XD
That's awesome :) Lots of my friends complain because I'm playing LoL too early for their timezone because I like to play in the morning before work.

I'm not sure, but maybe the eSports section would be more beneficial for this thread. Fan creations seems like a play to post idea's and artwork. I wish you luck on your endeavors as I too main support. I've also become more proficient in the jungle as of late, since I use shyvana who doesn't use up mana with her abilities. So I'd suggest trying that out next. Good Luck, and while you're in here, take a look at some of the threads with high votes, they actually have some interesting ideas.

Yup I've been digging through the creations section, checking all the cool stuff out.

Also, I've moved over a bit to jungle as well.  Been playing a lot of Riven in the jungle, so another manaless champion might be a good thing to try out, thanks!
